title: How to use figurative language to make titles for my works - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll give you a few examples. If you want more help post your working titles in the question description. Non-Figurative Title -> Figurative Title Why You Should Eat More Broccoli -> Broccoli is Your Best Buddy The Marginalization of the Modern Woman -> Trapped in the Little Girl’s Room A Painful Experience -> Ooof!
